name: Ground Control (itch) (dudif)
description:
Ground Control is a crazy platformer where you have to help Major Tom reach his destination.

Made by David Freund for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

The game is best played at full screen.

Right, left, run and jump are the only 4 controls you'll have.

Easy right? well... it's not as simple as it sounds.
